summary: DockSide: Cold storage, reconciliation, merge/split semantics, computes recovery percentages and produces dock.origin_records.

important_files.summary: Reconciliation logic for incoming to finished products
DockSide design notes and recovery percentage guidance

notes: DockSide is where incoming raw supply maps to finished SKUs and recovery percentages are computed (H&G 70-75%, Fillet 50-60%). Keep cryptographic private keys out of repo.
